alert_file_size.message: Please mind that image size directly influences on the "New page" download speed.

brag_m_2_1.message:
Drag your file with logo here.
Supported formats: JPG, GIF, PNG

brag_m_2_2.message:
Drag your file for background here.
Supported formats: JPG, GIF, PNG
(do not use images with transparency)

chrome_extension_description.message: Speed Dial changes standard page to the new tab page with your saved bookmarks.

drag_m_2.message: Ready! Save your settings or drag the new image here

drag_m_3.message: Something went wrong, please, try to download another image

drag_m_4.message: Supported formats: PNG, JPEG, JPG and GIF.

export_mes.message: You can restore your bookmarks and settings by using the backup copy file. All your current data will be replaced by backup copy data

import_mes.message: Save all your bookmarks and settings into the file. You can restore or transfer them to another computer if necessary

loc_10.message: Choose where to display "Settings" and "Groups" buttons

loc_13.message: If you want you can disable the background image

loc_15.message: Background filling is activated only when "background image" is disabled

loc_16.message: If you enjoy using this extension, you can share it with your friends

loc_30.message: To remove or edit the bookmark, click on it with the right mouse button and choose the respective action from menu list.

loc_31.message:
You can group the bookmarks.
You can navigate through groups with a shortcut Alt + n (where n is the group number)

loc_32.message: Groups can be also changed or edited via the context menu. Just click on the group button with the right mouse button. If you don't need some groups, you can disable them in Settings.

loc_33.message: In the extension settings you can change background, search engine, plates size and many more. To open the settings, just click on the button with the cogwheel.

loc_34.message: You can create the reserve copy of all your bookmarks on the settings page in "Import/Export" section.

loc_35.message: If you have any difficulties with the extension use or you want to suggest us your ideas, please, write us about it. We appreciate the opinion of every our user.

loc_47_2.message:
bookmarks in this group.
You can delete or move them to another group.

loc_50.message: I confirm that I want to delete group

loc_57.message: Do you want to delete the bookmark?

rate_1.message:
Do you like your new
"Visual Bookmarks" page?

rate_5.message:
Please, rate us on Google WebStore.
Your positive feedback is our best reward.

sett_desc_1.message: Changes system that is used in the search bar.

sett_desc_2.message: Allows to set the amount of cards "bookmarks" in one row

sett_desc_3.message: Insert link to the background image

sett_desc_4.message: The background with lowest quality will be downloaded by default. In some cases it will seriously increase the speed of "New page" opening

sett_label_2.message: Amount of bookmarks in a row
